description: The PB_TX_SET_INVOICE table lists invoices associated with a premium billing payment transaction set.

columns.name: PB_TXSET_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the premium billing transaction set.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line count for the invoice on the transaction set.

columns.name: PB_INVC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the invoice associated with the transaction set.

columns.name: INVOICE_PORTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The invoice portion covered by this transaction set.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Entire Invoice


Custom Portion of Invoice


Remaining Invoice


All Outstanding Txs


None. Custom PTS Advice used in PBU

columns.name: INVOICE_BILL_DATE
columns.description: This field stores the date of the current or future invoice associated with this line.
